name: Age of Empires
description:
This script is a complement installer to "Age of Empires I" and "Age of Empires I: Rise of Rome" or "Age of Empires I: Gold Edition", they should be installed before to launch this installer. 
During install please let all options by default.
Credits: https://upatch-hd.weebly.com/
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- "Age of Empires: Rise of Rome" will be updated to unofficial 1.1-R4 version.
- Support for 9 game languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Polish, Russian and Chinese.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
extends: age-of-empires
files:
- upatchhd:
    filename: UPatch_HD_1.1-R4.zip
    url: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nh7nudvgtrvlgwd/UPatch_HD_1.1-R4.zip?dl=1
- winemono: http://dl.winehq.org/wine/wine-mono/4.9.3/wine-mono-4.9.3.msi
installer:
- task:
    executable: winemono
    name: wineexec
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: upatchhd
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/UPatch HD 1.1-R4 Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
wine:
  Desktop: true
